title: CHAPTER I—JOE MAXWELL MAKES A START

book.title: On the Plantation
book.description: 简介： The post-office in the middle Georgia village of Hillsborough used to be a queer little place, whatever it is now. It was fitted up in a cellar; and the postmaster, who was an enterprising gentleman from Connecticut, had arranged matters so that thos...
